info.label: Content library administrator (sample)
info.summary: Provides full access to Content Library service

info.label: No Trusted Infrastructure administrator
info.summary: Full access without Trusted Infrastructure privileges

info.label: Trusted Infrastructure administrator
info.summary: Setup and monitoring of Trusted Infrastructure

info.label: No cryptography administrator
info.summary: Full access without Cryptographic operations and Trusted Infrastructure privileges

info.label: Read-only
info.summary: See details of objects, but not make changes

info.label: Virtual machine power user (sample)
info.summary: Provides virtual machine interaction and configuration permissions

info.label: VMware Consolidated Backup user (sample)
info.summary: Used by the Consolidated Backup utility

info.label: Datastore consumer (sample)
info.summary: Assigned to datastores to allow creating disks or snapshots

info.label: Network administrator (sample)
info.summary: Assigned to networks to allow association of virtual machines or hosts with networks

info.label: Virtual Machine console user
info.summary: Provides virtual machine console interaction permissions. This role is required for VMRC sessions. Exercise caution when altering/removing this role from vCenter Server.

info.label: Content Library Registry administrator (sample)
info.summary: Provides full access to Registry Service
